title: Workplace Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Through Context-Based Virtual Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical operations and workplace document interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Integration of VR-based office environment simulations with real-world business scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can solve budget allocation problems presented in VR simulations through mathematical modeling.
Learners can explain statistical reasoning processes in complex datasets through team project-based assessments.
Learners can solve workplace-related spatial geometry problems with 80% accuracy using digital tools in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
